content:
Hi!
I am making a profile for a DiGA (digital health application, you will probably get more of us trying to do this) and I'd like to use the german national base profile in some places. I would like to use the r4 version, which is in alpha right now. Do you have any idea of when you are looking to release the first r4 version as a stable package/build? I haven't found any information on the github repository.

Hi @Max Körlinge.

English: We are currently balloting, so we hope to release the first stable package soon. The final date is not set yet as it depends on the number of severe comments.

Deutsch: Wir ballotieren gerade bei HL7 Deutschland. Das Datum für die stabile Version steht zwar noch nicht fest, da dies auch von der Anzahl und Schwere der Kommentare abhängt, aber sie sollte zeitnah zur Verfügung stehen.
